title: Farmers' Guide to High-quality Seed Production

tasks.task: Start the tractor and attach implements.
subtasks: Enter the tractor cab.
Start the tractor engine.
Exit the tractor cab.
Approach the storage area to select appropriate implements.
Lift the implement into position.
Secure the implement to the tractor.
Position the harvester over the crop.
Adjust the harvester settings for optimal harvest.
Monitor the harvester operation.
Clean the harvested crop.
Attach a trailer to the tractor.
Transfer the harvested crop to the trailer.
Secure the crop on the trailer.
Drive the trailer to the designated storage area.
Unload the crop from the trailer.

tasks.task: Conduct maintenance checks on the farm equipment.
subtasks: Inspect the tractor for proper operation.
Lubricate moving parts of the equipment.
Check fluid levels in the tractor and implements.
Replace any worn or damaged parts.
Set up the planter with seed.
Adjust the depth and spacing of seed placement.
Attach the planter to the tractor.
Operate the planter to plant seeds in rows.

tasks.task: Spray pesticides or herbicides on crops.
subtasks: Fill the sprayer tank with the desired chemical.
Attach the sprayer equipment to the tractor.
Calibration of the sprayer.
Drive the tractor through the fields, applying the chemical evenly.

tasks.task: Prepare the soil with a tiller.
subtasks: Position the tiller in the field.
Operate the tiller to break up the soil.
Navigate the tiller through the designated area.
Drive the tractor to the pasture area.
Open the gate to allow livestock access.
Observe the livestock for any health issues.
Close the gate when livestock have had sufficient grazing.
Operate the hay conditioner/equipment.
Roll the hay into bales.
Transfer the bales to storage.
Load fertilizer onto the spreader.
Attach the spreader to the tractor.
Set the spreader to the correct application rate.
Drive the tractor over the crops, distributing the fertilizer evenly.
Inspect the irrigation pipes and sprinklers for leaks.
Turn on the water supply to the irrigation system.
Monitor the water distribution across the fields.
Drive the fertilizer spreader to the fields.
Unload the fertilizer from the spreader.
Attach the spreader to the tractor.
Spread the fertilizer uniformly in the fields.
Locate the damaged section of the fence.
Remove any debris or vegetation around the fence post.
Replace the damaged fence panel.
Secure the new panel to the fence posts.
Collect the manure from the barn.
Transfer the manure to the spreader.
Assist in the loading process by directing the spreader.
Control the spreader as it dispenses the manure.
Collect soil samples from various parts of the fields.
Send the samples to a laboratory for analysis.
Interpret the results to determine fertilizer needs.
Enter the combine cab.
Start the combine engine.
Attach the combine to the tractor.
Begin harvesting the crop by operating the combine.
Transfer the harvested grain into the wagon.
Unload the grain into the storage facility.
Prepare the vaccine.
Approach the livestock for handling.
Safely restrain the livestock.
Administer the vaccine according to protocol.
Document the vaccination date and type.
Approach the sheep with a vehicle or on foot.
Guide the sheep towards the destination using a vehicle's sound or a flag.
Ensure all sheep are accounted for and safely moved.
Attach the seeding equipment to the tractor.
Operate the seeder to plant the seeds evenly.
Monitor the seeding depth and spacing.

tasks.task: Cultivate the soil with a cultivator.
subtasks: Position the cultivator in the field.
Operate the cultivator to turn the soil.
Check the depth of cultivation.

tasks.task: Collect eggs from the chicken coop.
subtasks: Open the entrance to the chicken coop.
Gingerly collect eggs from the nest boxes.
Place the eggs in a basket or container for transport.
Close the coop entrance securely.
Prepare the land for planting by breaking up clumps or applying lime.
Spread organic matter or fertilizer on the field.
Tamp down the soil to ensure good contact with the fertilizer.
Transport the grain from the storage facility to the mill.
Clean the grain to remove impurities.
Operate the grinder to mill the grain into flour.
Package the milled grain for storage or sale.
Select the appropriate seed.
Fill the planter's seed boxes.
Adjust the depth and spacing for the specific crop.
Secure the planter to the tractor.
Operate the planter to plant seeds in the field.
Survey the area to determine fencing placement.
Allocate materials/drive fence posts into the ground.
Attach fencing wire to the posts.
Check the fencing for proper tightness and safety.
Walk through the fields to examine plants' health.
Record observations about plant growth stages.
Check for pests or diseases.
Start the irrigation system.
Monitor water flow and coverage.
Adjust sprinklers or nozzles if necessary.
Observe the remaining feed in the storage areas.
Calculate how much feed is needed.
Replenish feed supplies when necessary.
5. 用MAINTASK和SUBTASK的标签来明确每个任务和子任务的级别,并按照要求给出。
